page.title: 01A GENERAL VIEW OF OTTERTON
page.content: This area combines the interests of Agriculture, the holiday industry and a restful retirement area. The farming is organised by the Clinton Devon Estate. Cereals are mostly grown, with some potatoes and milk production. Some of the houses in the village are kept as holiday homes and Ladram Bay has a very popular caravan site in a very beautiful position on the cliffs. There is an increasing number of retired people living in the village, attracted by the peace and quiet, and the active social life in Otterton. Also the proximity to Exeter,(9 miles) Exmouth (7 miles) & Sidmouth (3 miles) means that people with cars can easily get to the towns if they need to.
